author: sussman
msg: Routine to convert an apr_hash_t into a ordered, sorted
apr_array_header_t.  Notice that the APR array is full of (apr_item_t
*) objects, which contain {key, klen, val}.  This means that *all* of
the hash data is conveniently converted into the array.
Status command now attempts to use this function to print sorted
* status.c (svn_cl__print_status):  take a pool now, and call
apr_get_sorted_keys() instead of looping over the hash.

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_cl__print_status): handle all combinations of version state.
Produce script-friendlier output by never leaving a version spot
